org.netbeans.modules.masterfs.providers

Class AnnotationProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.netbeans.modules.masterfs.providers.BaseAnnotationProvider
      • org.netbeans.modules.masterfs.providers.AnnotationProvider

  • public abstract class AnnotationProvider
extends BaseAnnotationProvider
    Can provide status and actions for FileObjects. Register it using ServiceProvider.

    • Method Detail

      • annotateIcon

        public abstract Image annotateIcon(Image icon,
                                   int iconType,
                                   Set<? extends FileObject> files)
        Annotate the icon of a file cluster.

        Please do not modify the original; create a derivative icon image, using a weak-reference cache if necessary.

        Parameters:
        icon - the icon suggested by default
        iconType - an icon type from BeanInfo
        files - an immutable set of FileObjects belonging to this filesystem
        Returns:
        the annotated icon or null if some other provider shall anotate the icon

      • actions

        public Action[] actions(Set<? extends FileObject> files)
        Deprecated. Will be deleted in the future. Overwrite findExtrasFor(java.util.Set).
        Provides actions that should be added to given set of files.
        Parameters:
        files - an immutable set of FileObjects belonging to this filesystem
        Returns:
        null or array of actions for these files.

      • findExtrasFor

        public Lookup findExtrasFor(Set<? extends FileObject> files)
        Provides various (usually UI related) information about the given set of files.
        Overrides:
        findExtrasFor in class BaseAnnotationProvider
        Parameters:
        files - the files to
        Returns:
        lookup to be exposed as FileSystem.findExtrasFor(java.util.Set<org.openide.filesystems.FileObject>) - may return null
        Since:
        2.48
